modules.description: This module offers logical operations (negation, conjunction, disjunction, equivalence) and structural analysis tools (node classification, size measurement, variable inspection) for directed acyclic graphs representing boolean functions. It handles variable quantification, support set extraction, and manipulation of integer-indexed variable hierarchies, operating on an abstract type `t` that encodes BDD nodes and integer lists representing variable domains. These capabilities are particularly useful in formal verification and symbolic computation scenarios requiring efficient boolean function manipulation.
